name: cb_t
description:
cb_t is an arcade game developed in the context of a 48 hour gamejam.

In this game you take control of a spaceship that can only occupy 1 out of 3 lanes, to move between lanes you have to either use the A and D keys, or the arrow keys, or swipe left or right if you are on a phone. 

To gain more points you have to match three blocks of the same color, the blocks are fired in your direction and destroy every hazard they interact with. In order to fire a block you have to press the enter key, or swipe down if you are on a phone.

It's basically audiosurf but bad

Yes, the game has bugs, and yes, it also has no audio, however, the lack of audio has to do with the ideal platform to play this game, which is a school or library computer. 

The gamejam had a duration of 48 hours and the participants were required to use this asset.
